title: Karnataka: In Udupi, peace meet chaired by MLA says hijab okay in institutions with no dress code - The Indian Express
content:
1. Karnataka: In Udupi, peace meet chaired by MLA says hijab okay in institutions with no dress code  The Indian Express
  2. Hijab Row: Amid Intensified Protests & Section 144 in Pockets, Karnataka HC to Resume Hearing Today  News18
  3. Karnataka Hijab Row Live Updates, 14 February 2022: Karnataka Hijab Controversy News, Hijab Ban in Bangalore Colleges latest Updates, Bangalore, Karnataka News LIVE, Bangalore Today Latest Updates, Karnataka School, College Reopening News  The Indian Express
  4. Indira Gandhi’s ‘Hinduism in danger’ to Karnataka hijab row — This is what jihadists want  ThePrint
  5. Hijab row: Why empowerment through education is the only right approach  Hindustan Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Udupi BJP MLA Raghupathi Bhat said that the Karnataka High Court's interim directions, that 'students will not insist on wearing religious garments' till the case is pending, will be enforced in schools and colleges that have a specific uniform.
